page.description: Returns the physical row number for given logical row number in a specified Repeating Section.

argument.name: logicalRow
argument.description: The logical row number, same as physical row number if no rows have been deleted.

section.description: If no rows in the Repeating Section have been deleted, the logical and physical row number for a given row are the same. The Ids of the element in a row of a Repeating Section are based on the row's physical row number. e.g. {dialog.componentname}.V.R1.QUANTITY_A5INSTANCE3 - the '3' is a reference to the physical row number.
